net.moozisms.api.client

Interface MoozismsApiClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Moozisms

    public interface MoozismsApiClient
    Author:
    anonymousghost

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Boolean> sendGroup(String api_key, String api_secret, List<String> toList, String from, String text) 
      boolean sendSimple(String api_key, String api_secret, String to, String from, String text) 

    • Method Detail

      • sendSimple

        boolean sendSimple(String api_key,
                   String api_secret,
                   String to,
                   String from,
                   String text)
            throws InternalErrorException,
                   MessageNotSentException,
                   NetworkNotSupportedException,
                   InsufficientSmsException,
                   InvalidAccessKeyException,
                   InvalidPhoneNumberException,
                   InvalidSenderIdException
        Parameters:
        api_key - Your api_key generate from Moozisms plateform, example : vLaR6iXDoLrvSPzy
        api_secret - Your api_secret generate from Moozisms plateform, example : fbb2c6a0-5533-11e7-806e-cfdc8z11ccao
        to - Phonenumber of the recipient with code without 00 or +, example : 22890147895(00228 or +228 and 90147895, phonenumber from TOGO),13483158714(001 or +1 and 3483158714, phonenumber from USA)
        from - Sender ID less than 11 characters, example : Administration
        text - Your messages without the special characters
        Returns:
        true if message is sent and false if message is not sent
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
        MessageNotSentException
        NetworkNotSupportedException
        InsufficientSmsException
        InvalidAccessKeyException
        InvalidPhoneNumberException
        InvalidSenderIdException

      • sendGroup

        Map<String,Boolean> sendGroup(String api_key,
                              String api_secret,
                              List<String> toList,
                              String from,
                              String text)
                       throws InternalErrorException,
                              MessageNotSentException,
                              NetworkNotSupportedException,
                              InsufficientSmsException,
                              InvalidAccessKeyException,
                              InvalidPhoneNumberException,
                              InvalidSenderIdException
        Parameters:
        api_key - Your api_key generate from Moozisms plateform, example : vLaR6iXDoLrvSPzy
        api_secret - Your api_secret generate from Moozisms plateform, example : fbb2c6a0-5533-11e7-806e-cfdc8z11ccao
        toList - List of Phonenumber with code without 00 or +, example : 22890147895(00228 or +228 and 90147895, phonenumber from TOGO),13483158714(001 or +1 and 3483158714, phonenumber from USA)
        from - Sender ID less than 11 characters, example : Administration
        text - Your messages without the special characters
        Returns:
        a Map wich contains phonenumber with acknowledgement of recipient or null if messages are not sent
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
        MessageNotSentException
        NetworkNotSupportedException
        InsufficientSmsException
        InvalidAccessKeyException
        InvalidPhoneNumberException
        InvalidSenderIdException
